alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Blaine; Major; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 12:31PM CST until January 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Alfalfa, Major, Blaine and Washita Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
